tweet:
Why can we still not breathe?

It is disrespectful to kneel, they said. But they knelt on his neck.

Why is it so difficult to live as a black person in this country?

We cannot be read our rights. We cannot go birding. We cannot go for a run. We cannot do anything.

#GeorgeFloyd
